qas.question: What Off-Broadway theater did Perfect Harmony open at?
Before coming to New York, at what theater had Perfect Harmony previously been successful?
Perfect Harmony has been called a combination of which two musicals?

answers.text: Altar Boyz and The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee.

qas.question: In what month was Perfect Harmony's Off-Brodway debut?
What genre best describes Perfect Harmony?
What Broadway theater did Perfect Harmony open at?
What drama was based on two a cappella groups?

plausible_answers.text: The Jackson 5, Pat Benatar, Billy Idol, Marvin Gaye, Scandal, Tiffany, The Romantics, The Pretenders,
a cross between Altar Boyz and The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee

qas.question: What have The Romantics been compared to?
What Off-Broadway theater did Pat Benatar open at?
Before New York, at what other theater was Billy Idol successful?
When was The Jackson 5's debut Off-Broadway?
What type of genre describes The Partridge Family?

context: The a cappella musical <b6_0>Perfect Harmony<b6_0/>, a <a4_0><b12_0>comedy<b12_0/><a4_0/> about two high school a cappella groups vying to win the National championship, made its Off Broadway debut at <a0_0><b5_0><b9_0>Theatre Row’s Acorn Theatre<b9_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/> on 42nd Street in New York City in <a3_0><b11_0>October<a3_0/>, 2010<b11_0/> after a successful out-of-town run at the <a1_0><b10_0>Stoneham Theatre<b10_0/><a1_0/>, in Stoneham, Massachusetts. Perfect Harmony features the hit music of <b7_0>The Jackson 5, Pat Benatar, Billy Idol, Marvin Gaye, Scandal, Tiffany, The Romantics, The Pretenders,<b7_0/> The Temptations, The Contours, The Commodores, Tommy James & the Shondells and The Partridge Family, and has been compared to <b8_0>a cross between <a2_0>Altar Boyz and The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee<b8_0/>.
